name: The Wages of Metal (book) Tommy Concrete 2010
description:
'The Wages of Metal' is the debut novel by Tommy Concrete.

This is a story about Heavy Metal, Satan, drugs, alternative realities, the dole, sex, vandalism & the extreme metal scene of the early 1990's.
It follows the chaos strewn career of Hull spawned Heavy Metal band Cauldron of Lucifer in their quest to be even more Satanic than their heroes, the infamous Pictish Midget.
Nothing will get in their way, not God, police, death, birds or the fact that they are rubbish, tripping and insane.
